<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeletal Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1901)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Rarely, the bones of a spellcaster can be used to create a skeleton that retains a limited ability to cast spells. These spells are almost always offensive in nature, and the skeletal mage uses them with reckless abandon. Skeletal mages are often misidentified as [liches](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=68), and while not nearly as cunning or deadly, they still pose a significant threat to their foes.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

</column>

</row>

</column>
